cause.description:
We at SBPA are a group of individuals that travel everywhere we go with my Pong A Long table, you've probably seen us at Reveille Ranch Pool Parties and at the Exchange Pool, We spread the knowledge of the wonderful game of beerpong all across college station and beat countless numbers of opponents, whoes Next? Look for us at parties and challenge us
1. Must Love Beer Pong
2. Must Be good At Beer Pong
3. Must have played against me or Played at my old house or Played on my portable table
4. Must want to Spread Beer Pong Addiction
5. Must want to end the killing of pink bunnies
cause.mission: Turn everyone into Beerpong addicts and then beat them, Spread the love of beerpong, and Play as many games of beerpong possible
cause.name: Help Spread Beerpong Addiction Through Out College Station
